name: Gravity Battle
description:
Gravity Battle is a local competitive multiplayer where you have to use a little sphere and the gravity area around it to control a ball and push it to the enemy-wall in order to take points.

Default Controls:

Green player:
Move UP: W
Move DOWN: S
Attract: A
Repel: D

Pink player:
Move UP: Up Arrow
Move DOWN: Down Arrow
Attract: Right Arrow
Repel: Left Arrow

Start match: Space
